nodes.text: Areta Foss was a female Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul living during the war against Zakuul. During the Grand Festival of Empress Vaylin in 3630 BBY she was a Chef serving the party held in the Palace of the Eternal Dragon. Empress Vaylin's speech was interrupted by the arrival of first Alliance Commander and then former Emperor Arcann. In an effort to kill them both, Vaylin ordered the Eternal Fleet to bomb the Palace into rubble, regardless of her supporters still inside.
Chef Areta Foss appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during "Chapter VI: The Dragon's Maw".
